Prince Jide Kosoko (amụrụ n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Jenuarị ,1954) bu onye omee, onye ntụziaka na onye na-emeputa ihe nkiri na Naijiria
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ eze, n'ihi ya, aha ọdịnala ya nke eze ma ọ bụ " omoba " n'asụsụ Yoruba
A mụrụ Prince Jide Kosoko na Lagos n'abali iri na abụọ nke January, 1954, na ezinụlọ Kosoko nke Lagos Island
Prince Jide Kosoko gụrụ akwụkwọ nchịkwa azụmahịa na Yaba College of Technology
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri dịka nwata na-eme ihe nkiri na 1964 na mmepụta telivishọn aha ya bụ Makanjuola
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood n'asụsụ Bekee na Yoruba

Jide Kosoko na-eto eto tolitere na Ebute Metta ma nwee mmụọ site na nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma nke Hubert Ogunde ịbanye n'ime ihe nkiri, mgbe otu onye maara  -arụ ọrụ na Ifelodun na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme njem kpọrọ ya òkù ka ọ gaa nyocha maka ọrụ na Makanjuola, ihe nkiri telemuvi
Jide Kosoko nabatara òkù ahụ; o mechara gawa maka nyocha anya e wee họrọ ya maka ọrụ ahụ, igosipụta  agwa dịka Alabi
Kosoko gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri, o wee soro ndị Awada Kerikeri mejupụtara Sunday Omobolanle, Lanre Hassan na Oga Bello,  wee nwee ngosi ndị ọbịa na ihe nkiri TV, New Masquerade
N'afọ 1972, o hiwere otu egwuregwu ihe nkiri nke ya
Jide Kosoko edeela ma mepụtakwa ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri nke ya gụnyere Ogun Ahoyaya
Kosoko bịara pụta ìhè n'oge ihe nkiri vidio, na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke ya, Asiri n la na 1992, mekwa ihe nkiri na Asewo to re Mecca  na Tunde Kelani 's Ti Oluwa Ni'Le part 2.
Prince Jide Kosoko bụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ na-ewu ewu bụ Chivita
Na 2016, ọ kwadoro MeritAbode Limited, ndị nwe Emerald Estate
Kosoko bụkwa otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya akara maka Western Lotto dị na Nigeria
Prince Jide Kosoko lụrụ nwunye abụọ, Karimat na Henrietta,  ma ejiri ụmụ na ụmụ ụmụ gọzie ha abụọ
A maara ya dika na ọ bụ nna mụrụ ụmụ isii bụ Bidemi, Shola, Temilade, Tunji, Muyiwa, na Tunde Kosoko.
